WhatCanDo: ^What can I do for you little hero?
^What was that train in the mines?
^Do you know anyone else with a Key?
^What do you think is behind the gate?
InTheMines: ^You saw a train down there? We used to have a train station below the city, but it was closed a while ago.
^The trains were left down there as far as I know.
^Seems like one of them decided to come back for revenge.
KeyToGate: ^I had found another key, but I gave it to Zither from The Power Plant as thanks for fixing my hand.
BehindGate: ^I have seen many interesting relics from beyond the wall come out of the mines.
^I would love to see more of what's behind it, but of course with only one <color=#F8FF30>Key</color> that’s impossible.
